Ngozi Onwumere (amuru Jenuarị 23, 1992) bu onye America-  Naijiria na agba oso na bobsledder nke na-asọmpi mba ofesi maka Naijiria
Na egwu, Onwumere bu ọkachamara na 100 mita, 200 mita, 400 mita ya na 4 x 100 mita relay
Ngozi nwetara ọla edo n'akụkụ Blessing Okagbare, Lawretta Ozoh na Cecilia Francis na ọsọ 4 x 100 mita relay na asọmpi Africa niile nke afọ 2015 na Brazzaville, Congo
Ọ nọchikwara anya Naịjirịa na 2015 IAAF World Relays na Nassau, Bahamas
Ọ nọchiri anya Naịjirịa na asọmpi Olimpiks oyi nke afọ 2018 na bobsled ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
A mụrụ Onwumere ma zụlite ya na Mesquite, Texas, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mesquite High School
